item.title: How to Explain Bitcoin at Your Holiday Dinner
item.description: How to explain Bitcoin at your holidayÂ dinner Bitcoin has become one of the biggest buzzwords of the year. From the mind-boggling growth, to the stories of people becoming billionaires seemingly overnight, it is a topic that is dominating headlines in both online circles and the mainstream media. While the hype and success stories are all fine and good, most people have no idea what Bitcoin is, let alone the blockchain technology that backs it.
